WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 12.00 noon on 30 October 2024.
Condition of Rain:
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the sea areas around the Island during
the evening or night.
Winds:
Winds will be Westerly to South-westerly in direction and wind speed will be (20-30) kmph.
State of Sea:
The sea areas around the island can be moderate at times.
